data.title: The Biography Of Omarion
data.text:
Date of Birth

12 November1984, Inglewood, California, USA

Birth Name

Omari Ishmael Grandberry

Nickname

King O

O

Height

5' 7" (1.70 m)

Mini Biography

Omari Ishmael Grandberry was born on 12th November 1984 in California, Los Angeles. He is the older brother of singer O'Ryan. He and his former band-mates Lil Fizz, Raz-B and J-Boog were discovered by manager and director Christopher B. Stokes.

They formed a band called B2K. B2K stands for Boys of the New Millennium. They were formed at the ages of between 15 - 16 years old. Omari was brought up in Inglewood by his mother. He was the oldest of the members of B2K. He was the lead singer.

The band disbanded in January 2004 after appearing in the film You Got Served, Omarion then went solo and has a solo LP entitled "O" which was released in February 22nd 2005 through Epic Records.

IMDb Mini Biography By: Pam

Trade Mark

A crown on top of the letter "O"

Trivia

Was a member of the musical quartet, B2K.

His favourite food is Jambalaya.

Favourite sports are Football and Basketball.

Siblings: Amira, O'Ryan, Arielle, Kira, Tymon and Ukil.

Favourite movie is Braveheart.

Favourite actor is Robin Williams.

Omarion, Marques Houston and their manager Chris Stokes have formed a production company called Franchise Boys.

Favourite basketball team is Lakers.

Is not related to actor/singer Marques Houston.

Featured in Bow Wow's song "Let Me Hold You".

Is good friends with Bow Wow.

He won the Viewer's Choice Award at the 2005 BET Awards.

Is African-American

Will be filming the movies "Soldier" and "You Got Served 2" with singer/actor Marques Houston and director/manager Chris Stokes in their production company Franchise Boys.

His name "Omari" means "King". Adding the "on" at the end of his name means "King Forever".

His mother Leslie is his stylist.

His mother Leslie is his stylist and was B2K's stylist.

Chris Stokes is his uncle by marriage.

Personal Quotes

"How would I treat a girl if she was my girlfriend? I'm a really affectionate person and I like being a gentleman".

"You could live it up and be successful, but it wouldn't mean anything without love and friends. I could go broke and still be happy because love is all I need".

Where Are They Now

(July 2005) Preparing his Scream Tour with Bow Wow, Marques Houston, Bobby Valentino, B5 and others

(September 2005) Finished his Scream Tour on September 4th 2005.

(November 2005) Celebrating his 21st birthday (November 12).

(February 2005) Is releasing his album "O" (February 22nd)

(December 2005) Preparing "We Ain't done yet Tour" With Best Friend/Rapper Bow Wow

(January 2006) Finished "We Ain't Done Yet Tour"

(December 2005) Going on Holiday Jam tour with Bow Wow, Chris Brown, Ciara and Marques Houston (December 22nd).

(January 2006) Finished Holiday Jam tour (January 1st)

(June 2006) Is currently in the studio recording his second album "21".

(December 2006) Omarion's album "21" is released in stores.

(August 2007) Currently working with Bow Wow on their collaboration album entitled "Face Off" which is due out December 4, 2007.
